Name: Crafting Tycoon
About the game: Crafting Tycoon The tycoon crafting road design game. Do you like road planning , crafting , complex networks , tycoon games or trading ? Lets design the best road networks and expand them to create larger and larger road networks to assemble more than 40 different products, taking care of incomes & outcomes of money by importing &exporting from 5 different dynamic market systems, and trade between them to obtain better profits.
